relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi/rales.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Diffuse guarding and tenderness to palpation in the right lower quadrant, abdomen soft.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.

relevant_findings.ultrasound: A tubular, blind-ending structure compatible with the appendix, noncompressible with a thickened wall, dilated to approximately 1.2 cm in transverse diameter, lumen distended with distinct wall layers, tenderness noted during examination.
